amendment.description: To provide that funds authorized by the Act are available for the defense of the Armed Forces and United States citizens against attack by foreign hostile forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 861 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 4. Record Vote Number: 187.

action.text: Amendment SA 861 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Romney to Amendment SA 764. (consideration: CR S4452; text: CR S4452) To provide that funds authorized by the Act are available for the defense of the Armed Forces and United States citizens against attack by foreign hostile forces.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 861 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 4. Record Vote Number: 187.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 861 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 4. Record Vote Number: 187.
